title: disable skins in ranked/tournament.
body:
some skins have a hitbox that is really off,
and some have attacks that are hard or harder to see than the original
and some even give you slight benefits,

like the chogath skin enlarges the knock up hitbox :/

so can't riot disable the skins in ranked?
and tournaments, skins are great but not when it starts to affect gameplay .-.

replies.body:
so pay to win all the way ?
even if its slight?

maybe riot can disable skin effects at least?
and fix the damn hitboxes :/
They won't, unless they want to upset the people that keep their game running.
